name: PayBill.NG Woocommerce Payment Gateway
author: PayBill.NG Team

sections.description: For Nigeria Only,PayBill.NG Woocommerce Payment Gateway gives you the option to checkout with PayBill.NG and pay with our payment gateway.
sections.installation:
1. Upload paybill-payment-gateway-plugin-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on settings option that shows up once the plugin is activated, this will redirect you to woocommerce checkout with PayBill.NG Payment Gateway tab.
  4. Update PayBill.NG Payment Gateway form with the information gotten from http://paybill.ng settings page.
  5. Done!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload paybill-payment-gateway-plugin-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on settings option that shows up once the plugin is activated, this will redirect you to woocommerce checkout with PayBill.NG Payment Gateway tab.
  4. Update PayBill.NG Payment Gateway form with the information gotten from http://paybill.ng settings page.
  5. Done!

How do i get started ?

It’s very simple, goto http://paybill.ng signup and then goto setting page on the website to get the information to fill the checkout
settings tab of this plugin. if sandbox is enabled ensure to fill the test fields.

Why is Processing-PaybillNG draft page in my lsit of pages ?

This page is created by us, please dont make any modifications to this page nor delete it, it doesnt affect your wordpress site
in anyway.

i deleted Processing-PaybillNG draft page ?

If you deleted this page, simply deactivate this plugin and reactivate it. This will recreate the page

i made modifications to Processing-PaybillNG draft page ?

Simply delete it, and deactivate the plugin and reactivate it.

short_description: PayBill.NG Woocommerce Payment Gateway adds PayBill.NG checkout option
description: For Nigeria Only,PayBill.NG Woocommerce Payment Gateway gives you the option to checkout with PayBill.NG and pay with our payment gateway.
